instNote: ﻿This house is prepared to accomodate about 30 boarders.  The school is divided into three classes; the third is a high school department. Letters written to the establishment are addressed to "Sister-Superior."
affiliated: ﻿Conducted by the Sisters of Providence from St. Mary's of the Woods.

instNote: ﻿About 30 boarders can be accomodated. There are three separate classes - a high school, a common school, and a German school. Each has its locality in the city. Letters written to the house are addressed to "Sister-Superior."
affiliated: ﻿Conducted by the Sisters of Providence from St. Mary's of the Woods.
